Class Lion

  • java.lang.Object
    • Critter
      • Lion

  • public class Lion
extends Critter

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Critter

        Critter.Attack, Critter.Direction

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int dead
      keeps track of how many lions have died overall in this simulation
      static int MAX_DEAD_PERMITTED
      the max number of lions that will be allowed to die before a new stratagy is employed against a opponent that the lion should be beating basically assuming that by this time most of the normal critters have been killed off
      static int MAX_STEPS_NOT_MATED
      max steps a lion is allowed to remain waiting for a mate to come to center of map.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lion()
      constructs a new lion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean eat()
      this lion is always hungry, seems like the best way to get points is to eat even though you get a sleeping penalty, food is the only unlimited source of points in the game
      Critter.Attack fight(java.lang.String opponent)
      designed to beat all other critters, since we know their fighting strategies will use helper class or method to develop a strategy to beat other lions attempts to change stratagy if lion keeps loosing to something it shoudn't namely a lion hiding another another string
      java.awt.Color getColor()
      decides the color the lion will have on the screen reutrns red because lions are red!
      Critter.Direction getMove()
      clusters the lions in the center at first to maximize mating after lions have mated then they go out and random movement during the whole time if the lion sees food it will diverge from its current course to eat.
      Critter.Direction goTo(java.awt.Point p)
      will return a Direction to get this Lion closer to a given point
      void lose()
      method called when lion loses a battle will update the stratagy the lion was useing agaisnt the opponent it lost too.
      void mate()
      called when the lion mates sets value of isMating to true
      void mateEnd()
      method called when mating ends changes the internal conditions of the lion
      Critter.Attack randomAttackForOtherLion()
      generates a random attack to be used against an opposing lion
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method for the lion, returns a 0 to try to trick other lions this seemed like the easiest case to possibly slipe through other peoples lions undedected
      void win()
      method called when lion wins a fight will adapt to a enemy lion using a static attack

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_DEAD_PERMITTED

        public static final int MAX_DEAD_PERMITTED
        the max number of lions that will be allowed to die before a new stratagy is employed against a opponent that the lion should be beating basically assuming that by this time most of the normal critters have been killed off
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_STEPS_NOT_MATED

        public static final int MAX_STEPS_NOT_MATED
        max steps a lion is allowed to remain waiting for a mate to come to center of map. After this number has been exeded the lion goes out into the world
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • dead

        public static int dead
        keeps track of how many lions have died overall in this simulation

        public java.lang.String toString()

      • eat

        public boolean eat()
        this lion is always hungry, seems like the best way to get points is to eat even though you get a sleeping penalty, food is the only unlimited source of points in the game
        Overrides:

      • getMove

        public Critter.Direction getMove()
        clusters the lions in the center at first to maximize mating after lions have mated then they go out and random movement during the whole time if the lion sees food it will diverge from its current course to eat. My lions are extremly hungry beasts.
        Overrides:
        getMove in class Critter
        Returns:
        the direction to move next

        public Critter.Direction goTo(java.awt.Point p)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        direction value that begins to minimize he distance between the lion and the point

      • fight

        public Critter.Attack fight(java.lang.String opponent)
        designed to beat all other critters, since we know their fighting strategies will use helper class or method to develop a strategy to beat other lions attempts to change stratagy if lion keeps loosing to something it shoudn't namely a lion hiding another another string
        Overrides:
        fight in class Critter
        Parameters:
        opponent - string representation of opponent
        Returns:
        the attack weapon

        Returns:

      • win

        public void win()
        method called when lion wins a fight will adapt to a enemy lion using a static attack
        Overrides:
        win in class Critter

      • lose

        public void lose()
        method called when lion loses a battle will update the stratagy the lion was useing agaisnt the opponent it lost too. Will also determine if this lion just lost to another lion this is based of the fact that the lion should only lose to normal critters when it is sleeping or mating
        Overrides:
        lose in class Critter
